name: Protect Your Cabin Tower Defense
description:
INSTRUCTIONS: Use mouse or touch to click on turrets on the middle right side of screen.  Click on the green grass near the maze path to place turrets.

Players will have access to power-ups and a variety of turrets, all accessible on the bottom right of the screen. The name of the game is to protect your cabin: so defeat enemy minions, spend resources on upgrades, and keep them from reaching the end of the maze at all costs!

Stand guard and take the defensive in this tactical turret game!

Focus on stopping enemy waves before they can finish the maze, or risk losing it all. With only 10 lives, players will have to strategically prevent the enemy team from reaching the end.
